xml.about:
I am a senior engineer interactive Flash, ActionScript focus on the development, loving the interactive Flash Web applications, RIA is now increasingly popular, where he is a trend. Site display my past work, you can be seen, most of them in Flash Web case, long-term cooperation and excellent designers, as well as a large number of production experience, I have to learn how to use design to subvert not thinking likely to override the arrogance of the code above, and if they do not personally percussion code, do not advance to say "no"!
Site domain name: www.asflash.cn, my blog domain name:http://blog.asflasher.cn. I hope I can continue the growth of technology to become more and more prominent, three years of programming experience Flash, Flash bias in the application front-end effects. I hope that can do some interesting things, and want to draw a very good platform, I can give full play to their own advantages. If you have any intention of co-operation please enter contact plate .

works.title: IN 2005 THE DEVELOPMENT OF CASUAL GAMES SITE,RECOMMENDED
works.info:
2005 works, then the purpose is to learn Flash, and love the game Xuanyuan Jian, began to do this site. At that time, there is no new technology, but their level is not high, is too much content. This site on-line, many gamers have been agreed with the permission, they consider this site very interesting, the site of the screen are from games, drama and procedures set by me to complete. Spent about two months, while learning side of things to do. I am a love game players. In fact, this is not the real game, that is, casual use!

Click into the site: works/sites/flash
